snippet: A bubbly, charming 1-year-old had been crying and refusing to eat ever since she and her mother returned to New York from the Dominican Republic.
abstract: Children's Aid Society helps single mother Elizabeth Gutierrez of Upper Manhattan to buy a high chair for her daughter.
lead_paragraph: A bubbly, charming 1-year-old had been crying and refusing to eat ever since she and her mother returned to New York from the Dominican Republic.

headline.seo: A Baby Regains Her Appetite, Solving Many Problems
headline.main: A Good Appetite Solves Many Problems
headline.print_headline: A Good Appetite Solves Many Problems
